mission.title: Our Mission in Lima
mission.content: Experience the vibrant culture and rich history of Lima while contributing to local community projects and sustainable tourism initiatives.

overview.title: Lima: City of Kings
overview.content: Lima, the capital of Peru, is a bustling metropolis known for its colonial architecture, world-renowned cuisine, and beautiful coastal views.

group.title: Group Activities in Lima
group.content: Join our guided tours of ancient ruins, participate in Peruvian cooking classes, and engage in community service projects with local organizations.

explore.title: Discover Lima's Districts
explore.content: Explore the diverse neighborhoods of Lima, from the bohemian Barranco to the modern Miraflores, each offering unique experiences and attractions.
